text: Can we deploy Java chaincode when using docker-compose? Using a Rest API?
docker-compose is just a way to launch all peers "easily"
can deploy java chaincode using REST API , like this
Hey Gang.  Is the Java Chaincode keeping up with the GoLang Chaincode? I was just going to start doing a demo project and wondered if I could do it using Java

Hi all, i am using fabric-sdk master branch and running fabric v0.6.1 docker images. I have setup TLS following <http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/v0.6/Setup/TLSSetup/> link. when i run test cases i got following error:-

org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.NoAvailableTCertException: Failed getting a new TCert
can anyone help me to resolve the problem

now getting this error:-

org.hyperledger.fabric.sdk.exception.ChainCodeException: Certificate has not been signed by a trusted authority.
<@U11RW82PM> Java chaincode is not yet compatible with v1 architecture.. work to make it compatible with v1 is in progress. We will announce as soon as work completes, some time in January.
